law.text: The board may exchange license certificates with other states so as to allow registered pharmacists of other states to practice pharmacy in this state under regulations prescribed by the board.
law.history: Amended 1970 Ky. Acts ch. 221, sec. 17. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 2619a-1.
